alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 6:06PM EST until February 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total of 8 to 17 inches. * WHERE...Central Washington, Interior Hancock and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow and sleet means severe winter weather conditions will make travel extremely dangerous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
